subject: Re: Attention
body:
Hello Dear.

  Good day to you. I hope you are doing super good today. I hereby
acknowledge receipt of your email response with your personal information
and its content is duly noted. I write to inform you that I have received
the financial compensation form attached to your email message for
processing of your compensation fund payment file.



Please be informed that I have carefully reviewed the information you
provided in the financial compensation form for validation of your
compensation fund payment file. At this end, I will authorize my office
attorney to submit your payment file to the Supreme Court of the United
States for authentication and approval of your payment file, which will
help to facilitate your compensation fund payment from my office.



Furthermore, I was notified by the chief judge that will handle the
approval process of your compensation fund payment file that you have to
pay the sum of $550.00 as official mandatory administrative fee and it is
non negotiable since it's related to the United States government.



Thank you for understanding and patience while I work on validating your
payment file.

Youâ€™re also advised to cease all communication with everyone regarding your
remittance as we have short listed to relinquish to you and now urge you
comply and receive your MasterCard.

Thanks for your understanding as you follow instructions while I wait
to hear from you.
Best regards,

Mr Pule

subject: Re: Attention
body: Are you still  interesting to receive your fund

subject: Re: Attention
body:
Dear ,

I hope this message finds you well. I wanted to bring your attention to the
status of your package, which is currently awaiting your retrieval. This
highly valuable package, worth 2.5 million dollars, is ready to be
delivered to you.

To ensure a smooth and prompt delivery, there is a required fee that needs
to be settled. Once the fee is paid, our team will expedite the process,
and you can expect to receive the package within 24 hours. We understand
the importance of this package to you and your business, and we are
committed to ensuring its safe and swift delivery.

Rest assured, our company has a proven track record of handling valuable
packages with utmost care and security. We have implemented robust measures
to safeguard your package throughout the delivery process. Your
satisfaction and peace of mind are our top priorities.

I kindly urge you to proceed with the payment as soon as possible to avoid
any further delays. Our dedicated team is ready to assist you with any
questions or concerns you may have regarding the payment process. We are
here to make the process as seamless as possible for you.

Please feel free to contact me directly at humphreypule7@gmail.com We
appreciate your prompt attention to this matter and look forward to the
successful delivery of your package.

Thank you for choosing our company for your shipping needs.

Warm regards,
Humprey Pule
